page.title: 17PASTIMES - diary extracts.
page.content: DIARY EXTRACTS - PASTIMES.{Kate Bennet is a{10 year pupil}at{St. Nicholas' CE {Combined School. {1.} "I changed into my{jogging suit which is bright pink.{Jogging is the current{word}for{gentle running exercises and it is a{very popular pastime for{all age-groups}today" {2.}"I made the family{drinks of{coffee.}My Dad told me that it is the{Nation's favourite drink today}but only a few{years ago tea}was everyone's{favourite" {3.}"Went to the{lounge}to do my {knitting.}Although people{buy ready {knitted clothes}many{ladies like}to {hand knit}their{own clothes}this way" {4.}"Played an{adventure game}on my {personal computer}before{going}to my {music lesson.}I am taking my{Grade {Three Examination for piano}in February" I do{hope}I{pass!"
